title: baiters/advance_fee/sources/scamorama/noogie_douglass_musa.html
notes:
Scam-o-pause:

"libonline.org" looks somehow off. We should check anyway.

% host libonline.org
libonline.org has address 66.193.188.60

What do we get if we try it in reverse?

% host 66.193.188.60



;; Truncated, retrying in TCP mode.
60.188.193.66.in-addr.arpa domain name pointer cek.cc.
60.188.193.66.in-addr.arpa domain name pointer luv.info.
60.188.193.66.in-addr.arpa domain name pointer d3co.edu.
60.188.193.66.in-addr.arpa domain name pointer d3co.org.
...
...
60.188.193.66.in-addr.arpa domain name pointer covenantsinglesandmarried.org.
60.188.193.66.in-addr.arpa domain name pointer internet-dating-directory.us.
60.188.193.66.in-addr.arpa domain name pointer creativeinteriorartanddesign.com

Hmmm.

There are a number of helpful and interesting web sites which can tell us more about 60.188.193.66.

RIPE - www.ripe.net
ARIN - www.arin.net
LACNIC - www.lacnic.net
APNIC - www.apnic.net
AFRINIC - www.afrinic.net

The number suggests Asia . And indeed, APNIC reports:


inetnum:      60.188.128.0 - 60.188.255.255
netname:      CHINANET-ZJ-TZ
descr:        CHINANET-ZJ Taizhou node network
descr:        Zhejiang Telecom
address:      No.378 Yan'an Road,Hangzhou,Zhejiang.310006
e-mail:       antispam@dcb.hz.zj.cn
trouble:      send spam reports to antispam@dcb.hz.zj.cn
trouble:      and abuse reports to antispam@dcb.hz.zj.cn
trouble:      Please include detailed information and times in UTC
remarks:      http://www.zjtelecom.com.cn

Does "London International Bank" even exist?
Yes. The Lads seem to have copied a good bit of their content from:
http://www.londonintbank.com/profile/profile.htm

Is their choice of banks from which to crib a political statement?
http://www.guardian.co.uk/westafrica/story/0,13764,1498206,00.html
You be the judge. And we rejoin the scam partway through Mr. Lloyd's e-mail:

THIS AGREEMENT WAS MADE KNOWN TO THE ORIGINAL DEPOSITOR BEFORE DEPOSITING THE FUNDS IN OUR CUSTODY. AS THE BENEFICIARY, YOU ARE ESXPECTED TO COMPLY WITH OUR INSTRUCTION WHILE WE RENDER BEST OF SERVICES TO YOU WHICH OUR COMPANY IS KNOWN OF.

WE AWAIT THE PAYMENT CONFIRMATION TO NECESSITATE THE TRANSFERRING OF YOUR BENEFIT TO YOU. 

YOURS IN SERVICE, 
MR. GEORGE. LLYOD. 
DIRECTOR: FOREIGN OPERATIONS, 
GLOBAL DIPLOMATIC & SECURITY COURIER SERVICE COMPANY LTD, 
DUBAI, 
UAE.

messages.subject: May God bless you
messages.body:
ATTN: PRESIDENT / CEO, 
Dear Sir,25/07/2005 
REQUREST FOR YOUR CO-OPERATION 

I am Dr. Douglass Musa, I am 78 years old; anative of Dubai. 

My late father was killed by his business associatein 2001,and during the period i married we had a sonwhich both of them was also killed in a cold blood a year later, I am now afriad of showing myself out to them (Business Associate Including members of my Family) as all are wanting to deny or kill me too,All because after the death of my father, Inherited all his business and wealth.

Currently, I am suffering from long time cancer ofhe brian. From all indications,my condition isreally deteriorating and is quiteobvious that I may not live more than six months, because the cancer stage has gotten to a very Sever stage. Infact, my personal physician told me that I may not live for more than six months and I am so scared about this. So, I now decided to divide part of this wealth,by contributing to the well beign of lessprivileged people and handicapped in the society of Asian,which is in my place, America Europe and African Countries.

This mission, which will no doubt be tasking hadmade me to recently relocate from my family house to new place where I live presently due to the preassure my family members are giving me as they want to share the fund within themself's which i don't want. I selected you for this Purpose and prayed over it, I am willing to donate the sum of $15,300,000.00Million US Dollars to you for the development of the well beign of handicapped in the society and also as aids for the less privileged around your country,and i have mapped out $1,300,000.00 for your own personal use to help me for this work.

Please note that, this fund is currently lying in a Security Company in Europe and, therefore my ATTORNEY will file an immediate application for the transfer of the money in your name or yourhome.Please,do not reply me if you have the intention of using this fund for personal use,than enhancement of the comfort of theHandicapped.Lastly, I want you/your home to be praying for me as regards my entire life and my health because I have come to find out since my spiritual rebirth lately that wealth acquisition without God in one's life is vanity upon vanity.

1, Give immediate reply to this proposal, using thisemail address Upon receipt of your response andagreeing with my terms, Email-

Thanks and regards 
Dr Douglass Musa

messages.body:
Mon, 1 Aug 2005 

Dearset Lewis D. Noogie, 

I am most grateful for your mail, and I seize this opportunity to thank you for coming to my rescue and to let you know also that this transaction is a straight forward and legal transaction and now i am in hospital this is not an mistake.

With great pleasure I am sincerely seeking your confidence in this transaction I am particularly interested in dealing with you because I expect you to be reliable and be more helpful to me.

I am somebody with a conscience. If this transaction was in any way illegal, I would tell you straight away so that you know what is involved and decide for yourself. But it is not like that at all, and you will later see and understand that.

I hope you were not too embarrassed by my first email to you since you do not know me. I had no option since my immediate and extended family in and outside Dubai refused to distribute my funds because they want to keep it to themselves. I didnÕt know how to move the funds out and dispatched it to charity organizations, so I resulted to putting fate to test and making a random contact.

I got your email address from the web email directory and decided to introduce my plight and this transaction. I am communicating with only you at this moment with regards to this transaction. And I would not have any cause to do otherwise, except you state your intention to withdraw your assistance. Just like I stated in my first mail to you, this fund is presently in a private security and holding firm in Europe.

I cannot claim these funds myself as a result of my condition as of NOW. 

(1) I am under going medical treatment. It has defiled all forms of medical attention, and right now I have only about a few months to live, according to medical experts

(2) I want God to be merciful to me and accept my soul and so, I have decided to give alms to charity organizations, as I want this to be one of the last good deeds I do on earth It is for this reasons I am seeking for your assistance to stand as the beneficiary to the fund and retrieve it on my behalf and dispatche it to charity organizations All the necessary documents required to get the Funds out of the security firm are in my possession and I will be sending them to you after we must have come to a conclusion and reached an agreement, Not before. I need you to give me your words that you will be very honest and straight forward with me when the money gets to you, So long as you can execute this transaction successfully and help me dispatched it to charity organizations.

Thus, I would need you to get back to me on the following issues, 

(1) That you are in a position to be trusted as a God fearing person with such a large amount of fund and dispatched it to charity organization.

(2) That you are ready to sign a letter of guarantee with my lawyer on behalf of me due to my health problem, clearly stating the terms of this transaction, including your percentages and dispatching the remaining funds to charity organizations, as my lawyer will be a living witness that you fulfill your promise of dispatching my funds to charity organizations so that I am assured that the money would be safe in your hands even when am at the gate.

(3) That you are willing to contact the security company to discuss the terms of releasing the funds and bear whatever expenses (if there is any and you will remove any money spent immediately you get the funds) that would be involved so that the funds can be released and the money transfer.

(4) That you fully understand this transaction up to this stage and you are ready to proceed under these terms. As soon as I receive your reply that you are ready to proceed under these terms, then I will furnish you with all details including the company and my lawyerÕs details for the secure of the release of my fund and disposure to the charities. But if you have any questions up to this stage, please ask and I will be more than happy to respond to them. And I will also send you all the necessary documentations to conclude this transaction and the security company details as my life is too short.

Also I thanks again for your mail, your mail has relieved me and I pray to almighty GOD with his infinite mercy to reward you. I believe when God gives me a second chance to come to this world I would live my life a different way from how I have lived it now. I want you to pray for me so that God would forgive me and be merciful to me and accept my soul.

I will like you to forward your phone number and your home address so that my Attorney will get intoch to you. 

Thanks 
May God bless you, 
Douglass Musa

messages.body:
August 2, 2005 

Mr. Musa, 

Your decription of what you want to have done with your money sounds like quite a task and I see a couple of problems here.

As much as I would like to help you, what you require will certainly take a lot of time and effort. My position as a partner in an international hotel consulting firm does not leave me a lot of time. Having to interface with attorneys, security companies just to get the fund, and then having to coordinate with various charities, accountants, and all the time having your lawyer lurking over my shoulder sounds like it will take a greater expenditure of time than I can afford to make. I understand that the $1,300,000.00 you have mapped out for my personal use is a lot of money but I really don't have time for what sounds like a full-time job.

I hope your doctors are able to help with your medical situation. My knowledge of medicine is quite limited but I always find that asparin can fix almost anything. You may also want to seek medical advice outside of Dubai.

I certainly wish I could help but I think you will want someone who can devote the proper attention to this project. 

Sincerely, 
Lewis D. Noogie

I look forward to hearing from you again. 

By the way, my friends call me Lewd (short for Lewis D.)

messages.body:
Douglass, my ill friend, 

My worst fears about being involved in this transaction are coming true. What started out as a relatively simple procedure is growing in complexity at an exponential rate. Now there's you, a bank, a lawyer, and a security company involved.

Douglass, I am a successful businessman, a senior partner in the firm of Noogie, Dahmer, Lecter & Associates, hotel consultants to the stars. I know my way around a business deal so let me make a few suggestions to get this off on the right foot.

First of all, if your money was in a bank, why on earth did you move it to a security company? Please explain to me what advantage you gained by doing this.

Secondly, get rid of the lawyer. I have never had a good experience with those guys - all they do is collect retainers and fees for doing virtually nothing. Fire his ass now.

messages.body:
Thu, 4 Aug 2005 

Dear Lewd, 

I received your mail with a great sense of reasoning. l was actually advised by my banker to secure the money in the security company knowing fully well the state of my well being, health wise!. Reasons being that peradventure l die before the money is transferred to you, you will still be in a good advantage to receive the money as my beneficiary unlike in the bank where you will under rigorous processes . Dubai banking regulations poses more strictness on banks than security companies. But my greatest intention is to give the all the necessary assistance to get this money transferred to you, and that is what l did.

Once we come to a compromise, l will forward to you the deposit certificate for which l deposited the $11,300,000.00 USD into the security company along with a letter of trustee/power of attorneys which you will present to the security for the transferring of the money to you through their correspondent bank. The services and mode of operation of security companies here in Dubai is same as their bank counterpart. The difference is that the regulations on bank is more restricted than that of security companies on transferring of money out of Dubai

More so, the expenses you will incur is the cost of securing the Anti-Terrorist and Drug Clearance certificates as required by the Dubai Government and international Monetary governing bodies in association with the September 11 attack on the united states of American and the recent attack on the United Kingdom. These documents will be secured only by a well recognized lawyer here in Dubai due to the fact that they are certified documents, these documents will ease the transferring of this money to you from Dubai exonerating it from terrorism, money laundering and drug associated before international monetary bodies . This is the only service a lawyer is needed for.

My intention is based on the wise advise of my banker in recognition of the banking regulation of Dubai and that of security companies, The movement of the money to the security company is sole for your advantage to facilitate the transferring of this money to you before, on and after my death. All l need from you complete support and to give the stipulated share to the less privileged within your locality and internationally even after my death. Everything is under good control. You response will necessitate me to forward to you the documents for this claim signed in your favour and the letter of trustee/power of attorney, giving you the legal empowerment to claim the money on my behalf as it is equally simple to transfer the money to your account through same wire transfer from the security company's correspondent bank.

Once l receive your positive response, l will forward the documents to you, you will send it to the bank along with the letter of trustee/power of attorney which qualifies you to receive the money. Then the security company will through their lawyer assist you secure the Anti-Terrorist and Drug Clearance certificates after which the money will be transferred to you through telegraphic wire transfer. This is what my banker told me. As you can see, you stand a good chance to receive the money even through the security company.

You must act fast to enable me send to you the documents immediately as my health is fast deteriorating. 

Best of Luck, 
Douglass Musa.

messages.body:
Augut 4, 2005 

Douglass, 

First of all, let me tell you how sorry I am to hear of the further deterioration of your health. Is there someone there whom you trust that can let me know if anything, uh, unexpected happens?

Douglass, my friend, are you sure you have exhausted all medical possibilities concerning your disease? You know, I lived for a number of years in the Middle East and I have seen symptoms similar to and worse than yours caused by bad sidiqi. You weren't by chance on a bender just before the symptoms appeared, were you? It's definitely something to consider.

Go ahead and send me the documentation and I'll get the money transferred. You can rest easy, I'll see that this money ends up in a good place.

Lewd

messages.body:
Douglass, 

Good to hear from you again. 

Douglass, I think we have to be realistic and face the situation bravely. You don't sound too good and the fact is you're probably going to be dead in a very short time. I think it is most urgent that you get those documents to me as soon as possible, today if you can. I would hate to think that your last wishes could not be carried out because you croaked before you got the paperwork to me.

I'm glad that you have given instructions to your doctor to inform me in the event you are unable to continue corresponding. Take care and know that this transaction will get done in your absence.

Ok, Douglass, send the documents and then go into the light. 

Lewd

August 8, 2005 

Mr. Lloyd, 

I thank you for your prompt response. 

I must confess to a bit of confusion on my part regarding several points. 

1. I was informed by my friend Mr. Douglass Musa that I was to come to Dubai to retrieve this fund while you are informing me that it will be wire transferred. Please clarify.

2. I am currently consulting to a small resort hotel here in Gadyukina, Russia. I'm afraid there is no Western Union anywhere near here but if you send me the bank's pay-to account information I can transfer the money to you from my computer.

3. I have transferred considerable sums of money through my consulting partnership and I have never heard of a 'Drug Clearance' certificate, nor an 'Anti-terrorist' certificate. This may well be some sort of very recent requirement but I am completely unaware of it. I have a financial advisor in London and will query him on this issue, copying you on the correspondence of course.

Please get back to me on items 1 and 2. 

Thank you, 
Lewis D. Noogie

August 8, 2005 

Sir Charles, 

Please forgive me for this intrusion but I have an issue within your area of expertise to deal with and could use your advice. Please be aware that this correspondence has been copied to Mr. George Lloyd of the Global Diplomatic Security and Courier Service Company Ltd in Dubai. I would ask you to copy your response to him as well.

The issue at hand is this: I am in the process of recovering a fund from Dubai and I have been told that I have to pay for aÊ 'Drug Clearance' certificate and an 'Anti-terrorist' certificate. It's difficult for me to keep up with all of the new regulations that are always being imposed, but this is one I have never come across in the past. Are you familiar with these requirements and can you tell me anything about them? I would really appreciate your input.

I would love to inquire after Tushie and her twin sister but this would not be for Mr. Lloyd's eyes. Please pass on my regards to the both of them and say hello to Mikhaik S. the next time you talk with him.

Sincerely, 
Lewd

Lewd

messages.body:
August 11, 2005  

Mr. Lloyd and Dr. Macfarlane,  

It was with great sadness that I heard yesterday that Douglass was no longer with us. I was overwhelmed by grief for, well, .......minutes. 

But I have good news.  

And I have bad news.  

Good news first.  

I attended a séance last night and Douglass spoke with me from the other side. It was so good to speak with him at last in person. Well, not exactly in person 'cause he's dead, but we had a nice conversation anyhow. 

Now the bad news.  

He's in hell.  

Bottom level. Practically looking UP at hell.  

Smoking a turd there, as a matter of fact. Honest, his words.  

He was sent there for being a 419 scammer, and he tells me that even the devil himself hates scammers, especially stupid ones like he was and you are. He told me that you two are bottom-feeding, dick-headed, mouth-breathing scammers too, an embarrassment to the profession, and will be sharing a bunk with him when YOU arrive there. Oh, he also said I shouldn't send you any money. 

So I guess this transaction is happily concluded. All I can say is,  

Fulk you guys.  

And Douglass, if you can hear me down there,  

Fulk you too.  

Remain blessed,  

Lewd Noogie 
Gadyukina, Russia
